title: Saw a dad in the store shopping for back to school stuff.

author: madsdyd
text:
But still weird to me that a daughter's need for underwear should somehow be embarrassing to the father. Why? Do you guys think father's assume girls can grow without needing underwear?

And, yes, I do have a 15 year old daughter. I really don't think her choice of under garments could be a source of embarrassment to either of us.

author: AllFatherElena
text:
OK. That's you. Not everyone feels that way, and not every 15 y/o is like your 15 y/o. We're all individuals, something our shitty parents never recognized. We were punished for trying to be our own person or feeling an emotion the narc didn't like.

This girl's father obviously knew his daughter needed to be reassured and dignified, and he did that.
